data.text: @petermacpei @InfoPEI I saw that report, only 12% effective for omicron. Looks like they’re going to need more than 2 doses.

@InfoPEI The Pfizer “covid vaccine” offered almost no protection against infection for kids ages 5-11.

 Considering these kids are under virtually zero risk from covid, giving them this shot is absolute insanity. 

The same applies for older kids. 
Back off @InfoPEI
@InfoPEI @PSBPEI Boosters are unnecessary for this age group, according to WHO.
